data.name: Learners_May_Experience_Diffiuclt_Circumstaces_During_Placement

data.name: Learners_May_Experience_Diffiuclt_Circumstaces_During_Placement
data.value: Learners may experience difficult circumstances during their placement, which mean they are unable to complete the minimum placement hours before the end of the second year.

data.name: You_Must_Make_Sure_Any_Changes_To_The_Learner_Record
data.value: You must make sure any changes to the learner record, including the industry placement status, are made in this service before 31 July [YEAR]. This is to ensure the learner’s results and certificate are accurate.

data.name: Summary_Text_What_Is_Special_Consideration
data.value: What is special consideration?

data.name: Summary_Text_What_If_Industry_Placement_Status_Change
data.value: What if the industry placement status changes?

data.name: Validation_Message
data.value: Tell us whether this learner has completed their industry placement

data.name: Yes_Completed_Option_Text
data.value: Yes, completed, or will be completed by 31 July [YEAR]

data.name: Yes_Completed_With_Special_Consideration_Option_Text
data.value: Yes, completed with special consideration

data.name: You_Do_Not_Need_Upload_Evidence
data.value: You do not need to upload any evidence, but you should hold supporting documentation in your own files.

data.name: You_Have_Discretion_To_Apply_Special_Consideration
data.value: You have the discretion to apply special consideration in some exceptional circumstances where students have demonstrated sufficient progress towards their learning goals but have not completed the minimum placement hours.
